attributes.action: Allow citizens to sue the government. ie Cancell that part of the Royal Prerogative that gives protection to the state against claims for its wrong doings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You can't sue the government when it damages you. This is wrong. It should be a right. You can claim via compensation boards, employment tribunals, malpractice courts, indemnity insurance and a bunch of other specific routes, but these are exceptions and do not confer a general right. There are too many cases where the government acknowledges fault and does not provide compensation because they are not obliged to do so. That obligation is surely an essential part of the social contract with each citizen.
